title: [QUESTION] Smooth animation?
body:
When I was making PRs, I noticed that the animation loop code in the demo gallery was not waiting for a "vertical blank interrupt", e.g. an event occurring at the refresh rate of the screen, aka vsync

For example, in WPF one can use the `CompositionTarget.Rendering` [event for this](https://docs.microsoft.com/en-us/dotnet/api/system.windows.media.compositiontarget.rendering?view=netcore-3.1)

I don't think SkiaSharp offers a platform independent interface for this?
